meta.description: Context Sensitive Help (CSH) for table tx_sbportfolio2_domain_model_file

languageKey.label: The file's title. Used in the FE and in table listings in the BE.
An alternative title for use in the FE.
An alternative title for use in the FE when space is restricted.
A short description of the file.
The actual file that this file record is for. This is a reference to a file in fileadmin.
The file's file name.
The path to the file in fileadmin.
The file's file size in bytes - will be converted in the FE to more human readable form.
The file's file type / extension.
The date that this file should start showing up in the FE.
The date that this file should stop showing up in the FE.
